name: Moto Stunt Up Hill Rider
description:
Moto Stunt Up Hill Rider is an exciting and realistic offroad bike racing game. Ride and stunt your Bike on dangerous mountains , downhill & hilly roads.Pass through some challenging levels like swampy mud track, every level . Experience the driving in jungle and thrill of amazing,hawk motorbike,dirt bikes,rush motorcycle,trailer bikes,fast sports bikes and heavy bikes chose your fast bike and ready for driving on wild roadless jungle like chilli devil & green devil as a jungle motorcycle driver.stunts like roller coaster.
Stunning,awesome 3D graphics
zigzag hilly roads
Smooth & realistic bike controls
